categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: A raid on the Imperial shipyards at the planet Pendari was undertaken by the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. Prior to the raid, the Rebels employed a slicer to discover the refitting schedule of the Victory-class Star Destroyer Gallant Sun. With this information, the Rebels were able to destroy the Gallant Sun with minimal loss of life.
